/bin/c++    -std=c++0x -Wall -pedantic    CMakeFiles/FragShaderDemo.dir/src/GLSL.cpp.o CMakeFiles/FragShaderDemo.dir/src/MatrixStack.cpp.o CMakeFiles/FragShaderDemo.dir/src/Program.cpp.o CMakeFiles/FragShaderDemo.dir/src/WindowManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/FragShaderDemo.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/FragShaderDemo.dir/ext/glad/src/glad.c.o  -o FragShaderDemo -rdynamic -lglfw -lGL -ldl
